documents.document: @SkySportsNFL Imagine Chelsea win EPL and no player in team of year. Unheard of. Is there bias against NE ? No.1 score def - no players !!!
@SkySportsNFL 1 x Special team All Pro Player. Brady/Belichick - ignored again. NE seem to play a different game. They aim for rings
@neilreynoldsnfl Can you ask Brady if he's asked Kraft to tailor the fifth ring specifically for his thumb ? Next year start the second hand
@henrywinter Simply a Champions League spot for FA Cup winners would do it. If winners already top 3 then reverts to 4th place.
@neilreynoldsnfl @SkySportsNFL All Pro team with a token player from the best team !! Makes it look a bit silly.
@flybe When will you have flights from Cardiff to Dublin released for October 2017
@AerLingus Hi, wondering when your Autumn 2017 flights Dublin - Cardiff will be available?
@Madds_jm @YouTube Cheers. That's Sunday evening sorted !!!
@RTEgaa Gavin next year has McCaffrey and Rory O'Carroll back aswell !!! #DUBvMAYO #SundayGame
@colettebrowne Discrimination if she got tickets. Expense of real fan. She should ask Delaney or Hickey to get one !!
@NonLeagueCrowd @GNev2 So long as the loyal 117 in unfashionable years are still catered for. Hardcore fans lifeblood of clubs
@henrywinter imagine Greg Dyke doing this to most committed Eng fans. Dictator & Pat Hickeys choice for IOC !!! https://t.co/phbcCSgIwp
@Shane_RossTD Going on years. Someone someday will sort this. Who's going to have the guts and get the glory https://t.co/ALUM2hiBpo
@FAIreland There for the first, will be there for the last but behind the goal in Ibaraki will struggle to ever be beaten #legend #keane
@MCATEER4 No need to defend Keane. 67 goals do that. 67 in 145 =46.2%. Rooney 53 in 115 = 46.0% with Gerrard/Scholes supplying !!!
@Shane_RossTD Only thing real fans want is fairness. Pity we didn't qualify for World Cup in Brazil !!! https://t.co/jVi9CtALyy
@RTEsport Alex Ferguson leaves League champs. Same team 7th next season. Carruth says Billy Walsh going has no impact !!! Looking silly
@MichaelVaughan @piersmorgan Odds for draw after all out (20/1). Odds for draw after batting again (8/1).
@paddypower Very true. But the 1/5 the odds ew rather then 1/4 ew means all other 7 you paid out less on place part. I'd Garcia !!!
@SkyFootball Martin Tyler report. Did schedule cost France? It saved them. Rd16 France 7 days rest, Ireland 3 !!! Tired players 2nd half
@themichaelowen Your FA investigating performance. Bet no looking into criteria of how coach chosen or why Redknapp not even interviewed !!!
@RichieSadlier We would've lost anyway. Stood off and admired Belgium all day. Anyone will look a good player with no pressure on them
@SkySportsNewsHQ @SkySports #ssnhq #euro2016 Expected airport type security. IrevSwe Paris Monday. 1 x frisk - nothing major
@rossgillwedding @anthonyl86 @airfrance @AirFranceIE @cityjet AF say same. Just not worth any risk for me so chose extra night in Paris
@rossgillwedding @anthonyl86 @airfrance @AirFranceIE @cityjet Air France. Websites say 6.25 and 17.05 on Sunday are Cityjet. 9.10 AF
@Dylanp87 Yeah they did it. Did it over Twitter. Wasn't many seats left at that stage a couple of hours ago
@rossgillwedding @anthonyl86 @airfrance @AirFranceIE Also rang and confirmed Air France operate. Cityjet normally do daily but not Sunday
@Dylanp87 Its gonna be cancelled. No alternatives on Sunday. Air France operate. I thought Cityjet but confirmed otherwise
@airfrance Thanks very much for your help. I understand it's a very busy time. Thank you
@airfrance Yes please do re-issue for Sat 11th. Can you confirm when all complete
@airfrance I contacted call centre. Flight ready to change from Sunday 12th to Sat 11th. I now can't contact centre as its closed.
@airfrance Flight AF1617 Dub to CDG 12th June impacted. What are your suggestions here
@AirFranceIE I need you to follow me to DM I believe
@AirFranceIE AF1817 and AF1617 are identical bookings and operated by Cityjet on Sunday 12th June. Why has one suddenly changed (AF1617)
@AirFranceIE Firstly my flight says "operated by Cityjet" as the one today AF1617 was. Why is it different now when earlier tweets said same
@AirFranceIE Can you confirm AF1617 on Sun 12th is operated by Cityjet as per booking which states this
@AirFranceIE When can I get refund. Travelling Dub to CDG 12th and return 14th. Need to now book alternate on SAME dates
@AirFranceIE What is your policy on strikes called. We would need to rebook. Refund should apply ? Can't wait till last minute
@AirFranceIE I have flight on 12th to CDG from Dublin. Returning on 14th. Are these affected by Pilots unions strike called 11th - 14th June
It's Rory's day not yours @EndaKennyTD. Did you tell him on the green you said Ryder Cup was between "Britain and the States" - Bad PR day
@ThomasByrneTD Just abolish the thing and move on. It's gone anyway. FF the one doing FG the favour facilitating them not other way round.
Changed referee to prevent Leicester bias !!! Did they then ask Spurs who to suggest #lcfcvwhufc
@FAIreland In the stand behind the goal !!! ðŸ˜€
@RTEbusiness "More customers" could technically mean 2. How many have stopped. Amazing they can say more customers but can't total amount !!
@mickfitzg @188BET If you could go back and ride one race over again. Which one and why
@coral What are you backing with your head that your heart says something else eg. Un De Sceaux / Sprinter Sacre
@gavreilly Why would Mary Lou vote to reduce DC to 2 seater. Tactical no.2 to FF. Has any CC contested an election after doing job !!!
@SocDems #ge16 3.7% in 14/40 constituencies is 11% really. Labour equivalent is 8%. 7 seats is realistic now. 4th largest party !!!
#newstalk @socdems 14/40 constituencies = 8%. Labour 34/40 = 9.2%. AAA 25/40 = 5.7%. GP 40/40 = 3.6%. Using Poll %. Seat Returns ???
#leadersdebate #ge16 This has been a disaster for EVERY one of the 4. The winners are the smaller parties and they're not even there !!!
@SimonHarrisTD Your leader has 32 minutes to save an election meltdown. 76 seats to 50 odd !! Legacy of FG, your boosting FF. Shocking
@SeamusjKearney @SocDems Google Dublin Mid West and you'll see who Derek Keating is. Btw 2011 - FG 76 seats - Health care costing = â‚¬0 !!!
@SeamusjKearney @SocDems I hope Derek Keating did not leave any "hot air" on his seat before leaving as she'll be sitting in it in 4 days
Never seen Varadkar look so flustered. McGrath has just demolished him. If he's destroyed, imagine how Enda Kenny going to look. #rtept
@EndaKennyTD Better tell Michael Noonan that so. He's saying 2022 now !!! Bit like 8/10/12 billion. 17 days left to get your story straight
@KatieGHannon homeless/healthcare/childcare, not to mention the 8th. Be honest, did that speech set out strategy to solve let alone sell it
@gavreilly Can you measure the sweat lost !!! Heard nothing because actually thought he might not last
@KatieGHannon You need to watch it on TV. Looked uneasy unsure and now know why PR guys don't let him on tv.
#fgaf16 The only thing I'm watching this speech for is wondering will he actually last till the end.
@SkySportsNFL #skynfl Patriots summed up by Butler. 2.50 left stops TD at 1yd line. KC score with 1.22 left. Did his job !!! #pats
@SkySportsNFL #SkyNFL How big was the OT drive by Arizona offence/Palmer going into next week given INT's, near picks and Seattle game
@nflnetwork #peytonstart If you lose its harder to justify losing with Manning on bench. Playoff teams will be much much tougher
#rtesportawards Michael O'Neill the outstanding manager. For any doubters it's the equivalent of Wicklow winning All Ireland

#bbcpanorama #fifa Brilliant. Come on the FBI

#rtept Hope Miriam learns from BBC guy. Ask hard questions, demand no waffle answers. Imagine what a host like that would do to Enda !!!
@BrosnanDamian @LaughingFooty @TheOddsBible haha. That might be Llyodee taking a corner in Zenica. Running low on players

@YouBoysInGreen Had to get SFA ticket in Scotland. Now no FAI record of being there could count. 4/5 away. Please not Bosnia !!!
@DarraghFarrell1 Vikings away week 13. Need to get to there with 5 in a row. If lose there, Arizona last game aswell it leaves them no room
@DarraghFarrell1 Can see next 3 wins before Arizona home. In business then. Carolina home next tough & Dallas away without Romo
@DarraghFarrell1 Yes but 6 losses and they could struggle. Tough schedule must go 9-2
@DarraghFarrell1 They are best defence but Arizona will win West. Two undefeated in south. 6th seed only and tough trips. Vikings danger
@DarraghFarrell1 Pats were 20/1 at 5-0 in '07 when I backed them for season unbeaten. 25/1 here is any team 16-0 only.Not sure about Seattle
@DarraghFarrell1 I have 25/1 on an unbeaten team. Worth a bet. GB and NE good enough. Denver away for both tho. Gillette is class. 51pts !!!
@labour You got shafted. Giveaway for FG voters. Even Paddy Power has decreased the betting on your no. of seats. #budget16
@gavreilly That's odd. 32 in class for our kids !!!
@paddypower 1/6 November. Would be good advertising to pay out early. Can't lose too much !! EK going mad before budget
